metadata.title: Irori: The Cross-lands Culinary Journey
metadata.description: Immerse yourself in the cozy 2.5D world of Irori, where you play as the chef on a cross-lands train. Cook delicious skewers with fantasy ingredients and meet fellow travelers seeking comfort.
metadata.keywords: Irori game, fantasy cooking game, cross-lands train, 2.5D game, cozy gaming, PomePomelo

hero.p: Step aboard the cross-lands train and become the chef, crafting delicious skewers to warm the hearts and bellies of travelers. Enjoy a cozy, engaging experience in a soft and inviting 2.5D world.

gameFeatures.title: Game Features
features: Charming 2.5D graphics with soft character designs
A delightful assortment of fantasy ingredients
Interactive storyline with a cute companion
Short yet fulfilling gameplay sessions (3-5 minutes)
Engage with fellow passengers through cooking and stories

gameplayInstructions.title: Gameplay Instructions
instructions: Select a variety of skewers to cook using fantasy ingredients.
Adjust cooking time to ensure skewers are perfectly grilled.
Interact with passengers to learn their stories and preferences.
Unlock new ingredients and recipes as you progress.
Conclude each session by receiving feedback from passengers.

questions.question: What is 2.5D?
questions.answer: 2.5D refers to a visual style that blends 2D and 3D elements, offering depth and perspective while maintaining a flat interface design.

questions.question: How long is each gameplay session?
questions.answer: Each session takes approximately 3-5 minutes, perfect for brief playthroughs.

questions.question: Can I play Irori on multiple platforms?
questions.answer: Yes, Irori is available on HTML5, Windows, and macOS platforms.

questions.question: Where can I share my gameplay experiences?
questions.answer: You can share your experiences and thoughts on our community forum.

questions.question: Is the game still being updated?
questions.answer: The development team is currently on a break, but future updates are planned.

questions.question: Who developed Irori?
questions.answer: Irori is developed by PomePomelo with contributions from several talented designers and programmers.
